title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9977.5 - Time and place of hearing or proceeding
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9977.5 - Time and place of hearing or proceeding

State Regulations
(a) The time and place of the hearing or
proceeding shall be contained in the notice of hearing or proceeding. (b) The time and place of the hearing or
proceeding shall not be changed unless a party formally requests a change
pursuant to the adjournment request procedure contained in section
9977.10
of this

Part. (c) The time and place of the
hearing or proceeding shall, as far as practicable, take into account the
convenience of the parties and the availability of witnesses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9977.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
